Web Interface Port (HTTP).Name: Web Interface Port (HTTP)
Web Interface Port (HTTP).Description: This is SourceGraph's Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

Admin Console Port.Name: Admin Console Port
Admin Console Port.Description: This is SourceGraph's Admin Console WebUI port you can access via a web browser

Grafana Port.Name: Grafana Port
Grafana Port.Description: This is SourceGraph's Grafana Port you can access via a web browser

Config Storage Path.Name: Config Storage Path
Config Storage Path.Description: This is where Sourcegraph will store its configuration files (use cache drive).

Application Data Storage Path.Name: Application Data Storage Path
Application Data Storage Path.Description: This is where Sourcegraph will store its application data (use cache drive).
